publications.title: LassoProt: server to analyze biopolymers with lassos
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce LassoProt - a server and database analyzing and storing information about the lasso structure in proteins

publications.title: LinkProt: a database collecting information about biological links
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce LinkProt - a server and a database collecting information about biological links

publications.title: Complex lasso: new entangled motifs in proteins
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce the complex lasso topology- a new entangled motif in proteins

publications.title: In Search of Functional Advantages of Knots in Proteins
publications.abstract: In this work we study the functional advantages of knots in proteins
